# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="e7230-102">Outlook.com 中的錯誤550/553</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e7230-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e7230-103">當您離開家裡並使用 Outlook.com 從連線的帳戶傳送電子郵件時，您的電子郵件可能會傳回550、553或轉接至禁止的錯誤訊息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e7230-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e7230-104">在 [**設定**] 中檢查您的[電子郵件同步處理設定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e7230-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e7230-105">> **流覽所有 Outlook 設定**  > **郵件**  > **同步處理電子郵件**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e7230-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e7230-106">請確認您的預設 [寄件者] 位址與您電子郵件的功能變數名稱相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e7230-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e7230-107">如果您已包含自己的電子郵件網域，請將其變更為您的 outlook.com、live.com 或 hotmail.com 位址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e7230-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
